title: Mahatma Gandhi Memorial Post Graduate College
text:
MGM PG College Sambhal, <a href="Uttar%20Pradesh">Uttar Pradesh</a> is a recognised college. MGM PG College Sambhal, is also known as Mahatma Gandhi Memorial Post Graduation Degree College.
The college is ranked B++ by <a href="National%20Assessment%20and%20Accreditation%20Council">NAAC</a>.
History.
MGM PG College Sambhal established in 1971, as a campus of 4.56 acres. The college is situated in <a href="Sambhal">Sambhal</a>. The college is affiliated to <a href="M.%20J.%20P.%20Rohilkhand%20University">M. J. P. Rohilkhand University</a> in <a href="Bareilly">Bareilly</a> <a href="India">India</a>.The college initially began imparting teaching in Arts Faculty. Earlier college was affiliated to <a href="Agra%20University">Agra University</a> but When Rohilkhand University was set up in 1974-75, its affiliates to Rohilkhand University.
Courses.
MGM PG College, Sambhal Uttar Pradesh gives Degree in Degree in <a href="Bachelor%20of%20Arts">Bachelor of Arts</a> (B.A)., <a href="Masters%20of%20Arts">Masters of Arts</a> (M.A)., <a href="Bachelor%20of%20Commerce">Bachelor of Commerce</a> (B.Com) and Masters of Commerce (M.Com).
Presented following Universities Academic programmes are being offered in the College at different levels:
Graduate Level
Post Graduation
<a href="IGNOU">IGNOU</a> has a study center in the college.
